name: Unlock the Three
storyline:
Unlock the Three tells the story of four characters trapped in a hospital overrun by a mysterious monster. These characters are:

The Police Officer: Strong and brave, they can lead the way in difficult situations.
The Medic: With medical knowledge and skills, she can treat the wounded.
The Security Guard: He knows the hospital's passages and security systems.
The Father: A devout man of faith, he can use his faith to protect the others and ward off the monster.
summary: Unlock the Three is about a Police,Medic,Security Worker and a Father trying to escape from a monster in locked hospital. Monster is also controlled by a player and each survivor has its own unique skills to perform.Survivors must be collaborate with each other to be able to escape.
